channel.title: What do you recommend
channel.description:
Well I just got 40 fishing and I'm going for 76..
What level should I start to catch lobs at(I mean catching them fast)? And what should I fish till that level? Thanks
And where should I catch them (If I start right away with lobs should I do catherby..its always very packed though..)

item.title: What do you recommend
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:6, topic:193932”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=258123.msg2143504#msg2143504 date=1206779369]
they will speed up soon. definately just stick with lobs untill you can do monks.
[/quote]
Ok so just stay at catherby? I got like a load in about 10-15min[/quote]

Stay at catherby until you can get into Guild.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you recommend
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:7, topic:193932”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=258123.msg2143514#msg2143514 date=1206779557]

they will speed up soon. definately just stick with lobs untill you can do monks.

Ok so just stay at catherby? I got like a load in about 10-15min
[/quote]
That isn’t so bad, because when I played 1k of lobs was worth quite a bit.[/quote]
I think i played more recently than Yz85Racer and they were about 250each, dunno though.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you recommend
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:3, topic:193932”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=258123.msg2143492#msg2143492 date=1206779144]
Start fishing lobs now (at 40) and get to 63. Then do monkfish to 76 or 80.
[/quote]
Well where should I fish them? I mean there good exp but it’s just to slow at catherby because it’s always so packed and I fish them so slow…It’s been like 10min and I only got like 10 or 12[/quote]

Catherby. The number of people does not lower the chances of catching a fish. And yes, you will start off slow. But if you cannot stand getting an inventory of lobsters then good luck with your two months of shark fishing when you DO reach 76.

Read full topic
